Class qFiler 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----qFiler
public class qFiler
extends Object
File IO for quadruples.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

qFiler()
Constructor

closeQuadFile()
close the quad file
createQuadFile()
create a new quad file.
emitQuad(Quadruple)
write a quadruple to the file
getNextQuad()
fetch the next quadruple from the file
getQuadFilename()
what is the name of the quad file we're using
removeQuadFile()
delete the quad file.
retrieveQuadFile(String)
open the quad file specified
seeQuadFile()
show me the quad file!
store(String)
save the filename to operate on for safe keeping

Constructor

store 
 public void store(String filename)
save the filename to operate on for safe keeping

Parameters:
filename - the name of the quad file to use
createQuadFile 
 public void createQuadFile()
create a new quad file. calls removeQuadFile()

open the quad file specified

Parameters:
filename - the quad file to open- use getQuadFilename

 public void closeQuadFile()
close the quad file

removeQuadFile 
 public void removeQuadFile()
delete the quad file. calls closeQuadFile()

emitQuad 
 public void emitQuad(Quadruple q)
write a quadruple to the file

Parameters:
q - the quadruple to write
seeQuadFile 
 public void seeQuadFile()
show me the quad file!

 public Quadruple getNextQuad()
fetch the next quadruple from the file

Returns:
the next quadruple
